metadata.title: CVE-2019-13038 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
mod_auth_mellon through 0.14.2 has an Open Redirect via the login?ReturnTo=substring, as demonstrated by omitting the // after http: in the targetURL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13038` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-auth-mellon - 0.13.1-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-mellon package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.1-1ubuntu0.2').
